inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy> 6 months and sufficient general conditions according to scales
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Histopathological/molecular clinical confirmation of the ALL diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Signature of the consent by the relative or legal guardian of the patient and as well as the consent informed by the patient.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pathological conditions that can alter body composition (diabetes, hypothyroidism, among others)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with sepsis that causes hemodynamic compromise and cannot be evaluated
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severely ill patients unable to participate in baseline measurements
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 5 months old male with undescended testis, otherwise healthy and in remission stage.
